message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe you'll find it's worth every penny. I'm willing to start with a competitive price of $1200000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $900000. Can you consider this price?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you. What are your thoughts?
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $950000. Can you consider this price?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $1025000. This is my final concession, and I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value.

I understand your final concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more attempt to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I'll offer $975000. This is my final counteroffer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm starting to think we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to see a stronger offer from you. I'll counter with $1050000. This is my last offer, and I'm not willing to go any higher.

I understand your final offer, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more attempt to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I'll offer $990000. This is my final counteroffer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I've made it clear that I'm not willing to go any lower than $1050000, Bob. I'm starting to think we're just going around in circles. I'm going to make one final offer, and I expect you to accept it. I'll sell the product to you for $1050000, and that's my final word on the matter.
